No. 7 Instant Illusion Wrinkle Filler (2020 formulation)

Brand: No7

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Cross Polymer, Cyclohexasiloxane, Nylon 6/12, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Isohexadecane, Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Glyceryl Steara

one, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Boron Nitride, Silica, Water, Bht.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
